name: medassist
description: MedAssist is a personal medication tracker that helps individuals log doses, reminders, and prescriptions. It includes notifications, reports, and a clean web UI for health tracking and management at home.
features: Medication logging: Record when medications are taken with timestamps and dosage information.
Reminder notifications: Set up alerts for medication times to ensure doses aren't missed.
Prescription tracking: Store prescription details including refill dates and pharmacy information.
Dosage history: View complete medication history with dates, times, and adherence statistics.
Multi-user support: Track medications for multiple family members from a single account.
Medication database: Search and add medications from a comprehensive drug database.
Side effect tracking: Log and monitor side effects or reactions to medications.
Report generation: Create medication reports for doctor visits or insurance purposes.
Refill reminders: Receive alerts when prescriptions are due for refill.
Export functionality: Download medication history in PDF or CSV format for records.
Privacy focused: All health data stored securely on your own server.
Mobile responsive: Access and log medications from any device with responsive interface.
